reviews.review_msg: A very clear instructor but marks unnecessarily hard.  Not sure what some instructors get by making it impossible for students to achieve A+ grades. There is usually at least one student that achieves and A+ but no one in our class.  Too much group work, a waste of time.
He is very informative and cares about your grade but his lectures can get boring. Everything was good aside from that.

Extremely friendly, helpful, crystal clear and leads classes in terrific discussions. As with new Profs, she is very tough marker.  She is more lenient on the presentations. Her classes are always fun. She even changes her teaching style to suit the students opinions.  Put extra care into your essays, participate and you should do fine.
